scripts.deploy:local: npx mustache config/local.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph deploy venusprotocol/venus-isolated-pools --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/
scripts.deploy:testnet: npx mustache config/testnet.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph deploy venusprotocol/venus-isolated-pools --debug --ipfs https://api.staging.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.staging.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npx mustache config/mainnet.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph deploy venusprotocol/venus-isolated-pools --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
